articles.title: Qatar 2022: President Buhari Hails Morocco's Atlas Lions for Making Africa Proud - SportsBrief.com - Sports Brief
articles.description: President of Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari has commended Morocco and the Atlas Lions for making the African continent proud at the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar.
articles.content:
• President Muhammadu Buhari has applauded the Atlas Lions on their World Cup progression
  • The Nigerian leader extended his congratulations to Morocco counterpart King Mohammed VI
